Class AtonalRow

  • public class AtonalRow
extends Atonal
    This clss extends the class atonal and implements the interface symmetry
    Author:
    andreas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AtonalRow()
      This constructs an atonal row composition without to spesified any elements
      AtonalRow(java.lang.String comp_name)
      This constructs an atonal row composition and specified the composition's names
      AtonalRow(java.lang.String comp_name, java.lang.String composer)
      This constructs an atonal row composition and specified the composition's name and the composer's name

      retrogrades the String’s notes.
